name: Yo-Yo Escape
description:
In Yo-Yo Escape you play a Yo-Yo who has to bounce, roll, and swing your way to freedom in this physics based platformer!

Designed for mobile using touch, but can be played vertically on a computer with your mouse. If playing on a PC, you can use the space bar to jump once you get a power up.

You can play the first 12 levels for free here right in the browser.  The final version will contain 50-100 levels, more locations, props, and mechanics. This is the early access version.

Please let me know in the comments if you want to play the full game, or have any other feedback. Also you can follow me on Instagram, YouTube, and Twitter to keep up to date with the progress of this game and my future ones.

Thank you!
